Pre-Game Insights: Goodwin is looking to continue his strong club form for the Socceroos as he prepares to play in his hometown for the first time in his national team career.
Tony Popovic, the new head coach, has had great success wherever he's been and is expected to instill a winning mentality within the group.
Goodwin has registered two goals and one assist in six appearances in the Saudi Pro League season.
The match will mark a new era for the Green and Gold with Popovic joining as the new head coach.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will bring to an end a seven-year wait for South Australia and Goodwin.
There has been good marketing and posters at the airport to create a different vibe in Adelaide.
Goodwin feels the pressure of wearing the Australia badge but views it as a privilege.
